title: ID this San-Serif, often seen in "Metropolis"
content:
...at least I think I saw it in the magazine recently. By the way, this was on a banner for an exhibit at the Central Library in Los Angeles. It accompanies a really nice graphic for the “L.A. Unfolded”.

Thanks!

Danny

BTW, my first time posting, so if this there’s no file attached, you can click this link:

[http://www.yeedesign.com/font\_ID/](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006195004/http:/www.yeedesign.com/font_ID/)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 13.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006195004/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%2013_2.jpg) | 45.3 KB |

author: Danny Yee
